entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 0.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries near noon. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023
